file.name: Swagger.yaml
file.content:
openapi: "3.0.0"
info:
  title: MLA Identity And Life Data Example
  version: 0.0.1
paths:
  /animal/{identifier}:
    get:
      description: Returns the details for the specified animal
      operationId: findAnimal
      parameters:
        - name: identifier
          in: path
          description: primary identifier for the animal
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: animal response
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                  $ref: 'https://github.com/AndyDe-Aldent/animal_schema/blob/feature/LifeDataSwaggerSpec/JSON_Schemas/Identity_And_Life_Data/iscAnimalCore.json'
        default:
          description: unexpected error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
    put:
      description: Updates the specified animal
      operationId: updateAnimal
      parameters:
        - name: identifier
          in: path
          description: primary identifier for the animal
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      requestBody:
        description: Updated details for the animal
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: 'https://github.com/AndyDe-Aldent/animal_schema/blob/feature/LifeDataSwaggerSpec/JSON_Schemas/Identity_And_Life_Data/iscAnimalCore.json'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: animal response
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: 'https://github.com/AndyDe-Aldent/animal_schema/blob/feature/LifeDataSwaggerSpec/JSON_Schemas/Identity_And_Life_Data/iscAnimalCore.json'
        default:
          description: unexpected error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
    delete:
      description: deletes a single animal based on the ID supplied
      operationId: deleteAnimal
      parameters:
        - name: identifier
          in: path
          description: primary identifier for the animal to delete
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '204':
          description: animal deleted
        default:
          description: unexpected error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
  /farm/{id}/animals:
    parameters:
      - name: id
        in: path
        description: primary identifier for the farm
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
    get:
      description: Returns the list of animals for the farm
      operationId: findAnimals
      responses:
        '200':
          description: animal response
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: 'https://github.com/AndyDe-Aldent/animal_schema/blob/feature/LifeDataSwaggerSpec/JSON_Schemas/Identity_And_Life_Data/iscAnimalCore.json'
        default:
          description: unexpected error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
    post:
      description: Creates new animals for the farm
      operationId: addAnimals
      requestBody:
        description: Animals to add to the farm
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: array
              items:
                $ref: 'https://github.com/AndyDe-Aldent/animal_schema/blob/feature/LifeDataSwaggerSpec/JSON_Schemas/Identity_And_Life_Data/iscAnimalCore.json'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: animals response
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: 'https://github.com/AndyDe-Aldent/animal_schema/blob/feature/LifeDataSwaggerSpec/JSON_Schemas/Identity_And_Life_Data/iscAnimalCore.json'
        default:
          description: unexpected error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
components:
  schemas:
    Error:
      type: object
      required:
        - code
        - message
      properties:
        code:
          type: integer
          format: int32
        message:
          type: string

Error: parse: paths: /animal/{identifier}: get: operation "findAnimal": responses: 200: content: "application/json": schema: parse schema: reference "https://github.com/AndyDe-Aldent/animal_schema/blob/feature/LifeDataSwaggerSpec/JSON_Schemas/Identity_And_Life_Data/iscAnimalCore.json": resolve reference "https://github.com/AndyDe-Aldent/animal_schema/blob/feature/LifeDataSwaggerSpec/JSON_Schemas/Identity_And_Life_Data/iscAnimalCore.json": invalid schema reference "https://github.com/AndyDe-Aldent/animal_schema/blob/feature/LifeDataSwaggerSpec/JSON_Schemas/Identity_And_Life_Data/iscAnimalCore.json"
